short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A vue.js web extension that allows choosing by challenges based on certain conditions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a lichess web page extension that lets you finetune what kind of chess challenges you accept beyond the options lichess gives you. You can combine rules that should be accepted and nest them. Currently available: Rating, number of encounters, team membership, number of encounters today, timecontrol, color, variant, user id, rated.
